actions.text: On agreeing to the Sanchez amendment (A017) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 207 - 219 (Roll no. 324).
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A017) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanchez amendment (A017) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 207 - 219 (Roll no. 324).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Sanchez amendment (A017) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 207 - 219 (Roll no. 324).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Ms. Sanchez.

description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to request that the Department of Defense produce a report on the spread of malign disinformation within the ranks and ways in which the Department is currently working to mitigate the spread and impact of malign disinformation.
purpose: Amendment sought to request that the Department of Defense produce a report on the spread of malign disinformation within the ranks and ways in which the Department is currently working to mitigate the spread and impact of malign disinformation.
